mapper.select: select id, processId,sampleName,species,tissue,sampleMsg,sampleStatu,tissueNumber,bloodVolume, concentration,sampleVolume,totalNumber,cellLife,cellSort,databaseType,SequencingPlatform, remarks,creater,createTime,currentStatu,rowIndex, sampleIndex,arrIndex,initSample,subId,concentrationunit, (select count(1) from cibr_task_process_samplemake make where inputId = input.id) as makeNum from cibr_task_process_sampleinput input where processId = '${processId}' and currentStatu = '${currentStatu}' order by currentStatu asc,makeNum desc
